profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on business analysis, requirements interpretation, solution design, risk assessment, quality oversight, financial validation, innovation identification, and technology planning. None of these tasks fall under either Core Software Engineering (Macro-Category A) or GenAI Specialization (Macro-Category B) as defined in the coding book. The role appears to be a business analyst or a technical project manager rather than an engineering role involving AI/ML tasks.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about its requirements, even though they do not align with the AI/ML engineering profiles. The language is unambiguous, allowing for a high-confidence classification.
